root: ^I don't know what would have happened if you arrived a moment later.
^If my timing wasn't impeccable, I wouldn't have a job.
^No, Ariar. If your timing wasn't impeccable, I wouldn't have a life.
^Well, if it wasn't for your magic call, I would have never found you.
^I am truly glad you did, my friend.
^You have done a lot today. You should go home and rest. I will take care of things here.
^Thank you, Ariar. You are a good man.
^You walk away, heading home. En route, they reflect on the strange happenings they had experienced, musing to nobody in particular.
^My magic felt like it was fading. Even trying to make that call took everything out of me.
^Perhaps I have overworked myself, after all.
